msContents.summary: Receipts for the payment of weaving taxes by Protas son of Mystharion and his son Protas

msItemStruct.note: Margins: top, 1.7 cm.; right, 9.4 cm.; bottom, 3.5 cm.; sheet join 7.3 cm. from left edge (overlap 1 cm.); on verso, in black ink: T 578.
24th year of the Emperor Antoninus Pius and 1st and 2nd year of Marcus Aurelius
Bancroft Library, Univ. of Calif., Berkeley

layout.ab: 18 lines, on recto along the fibers.

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: Year twenty-four of Imperator Caesar Titus Aelius Hadrianus Antoninus Augustus Pius, Mecheir 5. Protas, son of Mystharion, weaver, has paid to Eudaimon and his associate supervisors of the contracts for farming temple taxes at Tebtunis and associated villages, out of the public dues which he owes for the same year 24, sixteen drachmas on account, that is, 16 dr. (2nd h.) Year one of Imperator Caesar Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus and Imperator Caesar Lucius Aurelius Verus Augustus, Pachon 26. The same weaver (has paid) for public dues of the same year 1 eight silver drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (3rd h.) Payni 27, another four silver drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. (4th h.) Mesore epagomenai 5th, another eight silver drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (5th h.) Year 2 (date) two drachmas, two obols for the past year 1, that is, 2 dr., 2 ob. (6th h.) Year 24, ï¿½ 4 (?) Protas, son of Protas the son of Mystharion, weaver, (has paid) out of the public dues which he owes for the same year 24, eight silver drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (7th h.) Pharmouthi 5, another eight drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (Date) another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Epagomenai 5th, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Year 2, Phaophi 9, another eight drachmas on account for the past year 1, that is, 8 dr. (Date) another six drachmas, two obols, that is, 6 dr. 2 ob.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., II.602; SB, XII, no. 10986 Keenan, J.G., and Shelton, J.C. ZPE, v. 7 (1971), p. 176-178
